scripts.clean: npx rimraf build node_modules coverage dist src.svg test.svg
scripts.check:final: concurrently -s all -g -n syntax,format,graph,build,test "yarn syntax" "yarn format" "yarn graph" "yarn build" "yarn test"
scripts.pretest: npx rimraf runner.test.yaml script && npx shx cp test/config/runner.test.yaml runner.test.yaml && npx shx mkdir script && npx shx cp test/data/script/* script/.
scripts.test:e2e: yarn pretest && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 jest --coverage=true --verbose=true test/e2e && yarn posttest
scripts.test:int: yarn pretest && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 jest --coverage=true --verbose=true test/integration && yarn posttest
scripts.test:nocov: yarn pretest && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 jest --coverage=false && yarn posttest
scripts.test:unit: yarn pretest && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 jest --coverage=true --verbose=true test/unit && yarn posttest
scripts.test:watchAll: yarn pretest && npx cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 jest --coverage=true --watchAll && yarn posttest
scripts.graph: npx madge --image src.svg src && npx madge --image test.svg test
